title: Pipestone National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                         September 2010 Flood Flooding at Pipestone National Monument September 2010  Duration:22 seconds           Â                 Flooding at Pipestone National Monument   3 Photos  September 2010 flood at Pipestone National Monument          Quarriers & Carvers: Through the Years   9 Photos  Today, the Monument has 56 active quarries. Cultural demonstrators continue to carve pipes and other pipestone crafts for visitors' education and enjoyment.          Pipestone National Monument   16 Photos  View the beauty of Pipestone National Monument            Natural Features   9 Photos  Pipestone National Monument is home to many beautiful natural features such as Winnewissa Falls, Lake Hiawatha, Old Stone Face, The Oracle and The Three Maidens.          A Look Back   8 Photos  People from around the world continue to be fascinated with pipestone and the sacred quarries at Pipestone National Monument.
